pkgmetadata.longdescription: # clubhouse-clientPython client for Clubhouse## InstallationThe package is available on [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/clubhouse/) and canbe installed like any other packages. $ pip install clubhouse## UsageRefer to [Clubhouse API Docs](https://clubhouse.io/api/rest/v2/) for more information.```pythonfrom clubhouse import ClubhouseClientclubhouse = ClubhouseClient('your api key')story = {'name': 'A new story', 'description': 'Do something!'}clubhouse.post('stories', json=story)```
